body.name: Egg Cooker for Microwave - 4 Egg Capacity Microwave Egg Cooker for Hard Boiled Eggs | Food-Grade Soft, Medium and Hard Boiled Egg Cooker | Easy to Use Rapid Egg Boiler for Hard Boiled Eggs

Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 7 hrs 28 mins
features: COOK HARD BOILED EGGS IN MINUTES WITH THE EGGFECTO HARD BOILED EGG MAKER - EggFecto is your new best friend in the kitchen! Fresh eggs go into the mini, portable egg cooker for microwave and perfectly cooked, yummy eggs come out.

PERFECT EGG COOKER FOR EVENLY COOKED EGGS - Thanks to the soft boiled egg cooker microwave-safe design, your eggs cook evenly and to perfection every time. No over-cooking or under-cooking with the EggFecto deluxe boil egg cooker.

MICROWAVE HARD BOILED EGG COOKER COOKS UP TO 4 BOILED EGGS IN RAPID TIME - Looking to fill more than one hungry stomach? With the EggFecto eggs cooker, you can cook up to 4 eggs at once. The perfect egg maker for share-houses and large family households.

EASY, QUICK EGG COOKER FOR FAST MEALS - Cook soft, medium or easy hard boiled eggs in rapid time with our amazing egg microwave cooker and hard egg boiled cooker. The mini egg cooker cooks eggs in no time at all. No more time spent waiting for water to boil!

QUICK AND FAST MICROWAVE EGG BOILER - To use the EggFecto boiled egg microwave machine, add 1 1/2 cups of water to the base, insert your eggs (maximum of 4), and then place the cover over the top. Follow the suggested cooking time and respective microwave wattage.

EGG EASY COOKER FOR FAST, DELICIOUS MEALS - Whether it's for breakfast or a light snack, our hard boil egg maker lets you make family-friendly microwave egg recipes in as little as a few minutes. Salads, boiled eggs, sandwiches - the choice is yours!

COMPACT AND LIGHTWEIGHT BOILED EGG COOKERS - Weighing just 145.5 g and measuring 133mm x 133mm x 165mm (5.2 x 5.2 x 6.5 inch), the EggFecto hard egg boiler cooker's compact design fits into cupboards and pantries with ease.

SLEEK, MODERN HARD BOILED EGGS COOKER DESIGN - Our microwave boiled egg cooker features a sleek, modern design that will complement any kitchen aesthetic. No more unsightly, bulky appliances that ruin the look of your cooking space.

HIGHLY DURABLE BOILER EGG COOKER MACHINE - With a strong pp exterior and an aluminum egg tray, you’ll be making hard boiled eggs in microwave for years to come with our egg cookers for microwave. Durable design ensures a long service life and superior performance in the kitchen.

EASY TO CLEAN HARD BOILED EGGS COOKER - Prepare eggs exactly the way you like them, and once done, simply disassemble the hardboiled egg appliance and clean with hot, soapy water. The must-have easy egg microwave egg cooker for express, high-quality breakfasts!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect hard boiled eggs in minutes!
reviews.reviewText: I was a little leery of microwaving eggs but for the price I thought why not? As you can see from the picture, no uneven cooking and the eggs were perfect throughout! And peeling was a breeze. Cleaning was simple with quick wipe with a dishrag and soapy water.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally...I can peel the perfect hard boiled egg!
reviews.reviewText: I am so tired of my hard-boiled eggs looking like the surface of the moon when I get done peeling them. Aren’t you? OK if you're making egg salad; not OK for everything else. So, if you want those "smooth as a baby's behind" hard-boiled eggs, buy the EGGFECTO.* The instructions are simple and clear, perfect egg making is easy.* The unit is durable and well-made (I have already dropped it), and will last for years.* Ready in minutes, more free time to spend with others.* No more boiling dozens of eggs at a time, only cook what you need.* Soft, Medium, or Hard centers, cooked the way you want in minutes.* Steamed not Boiled, means better taste and texture.TIP: Know the wattage of your microwave for best resultsI would (and will) recommend the EGGFECTO to anyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Eggfecto works but be aware of the heat!
reviews.reviewText: Efffecto works very well in the microwave - the eggs are really cooked to the egg hardness indicated. However, the outside of the eggfecto is very hot after taking it out of the microwave, even after standing for a few minutes. To open one must touch the top and unscrew it - unfortunately there are no small levers or anything to hold the top on the side which would making it easier to unscrew the hot top - so be careful and watch your fingers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Well I was very excited about the product because I wanted to save myself the time of broiling eggs. However the product was very bad. Firstly the exterior is way to hot after heating the eggs for at least 4 minutes. Second the eggs need as long to be cooked as with broiled water. Third after the first time I used it the eggs started exploding. Lastly the eggs even when not exploding were like gum. Overall, excellent idea for a product but horrible execution and functionality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I use hot pads to take it out of the microwave. I then quickly put it in the sink and run cold water over it, then remove the cap, run more cold water over the eggs to stop them from cooking more. This also creates eggs after shocking them with cold water, making hard boiled eggs a snap to peal. You get hard boiled eggs in 8 minutes in the microwave. For medium or soft, just opt for less time in the microwave as per the instructions which accompany the unit. By the way, the unit actually steams your eggs as they rest inside the unit over a cup or so of water. With a small pressure relief valve on top of the unit, I've had no explosions in the microwave from excess pressure. This thing is very well designed and a snap to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It arrived on time and undamaged
reviews.reviewText: It works great saves time and no need to dirty pots and pans sence it works in the micowave it cooks so fast and convenante.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Saves cooking time, but time which you spend washing the thing by hand
reviews.reviewText: Good time-saving idea but the web-vert clearly states dishwasher safe.The instructions that come with it state even more clearly that it is NOT dishwasher safe. It is easy to clean but MUST be hand washed.What's the point in buying something to save time boiling eggs so that you spend the saved time, or more, hand washing the thing?On an induction cooker, I can boil eggs quicker than using the microwave AND the pot can go in he dishwasher. Its another gadget to buy and store for no advantage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Be careful when removing from the morcowave; it is hot.
reviews.reviewText: It was the most easy way to have your way with eggs!!!
To be honest, its nit a real need. However, eggs get steamed well and are easy to peel.

reviews.reviewTitle: Best product I have purchased in a while
reviews.reviewText: This is such a good product and I use it all the time. 4 eggs in 8 minutes for hard eggs - perfect for when you are in a rush. No heating up water and setting timers, just put in the microwave and get perfect eggs every time.

The fact that this makes preparing eggs as easy as microwaving whatever frozen food is literally a dream. I am not bothered cooking and the whole “get a pan, put water, boil water blablabla” it’s literally such a hassle, so I never did it. This little gem is now a staple in my kitchen!
